def inverter_downtime_logic(Block_list,Radiation_Tag,missing_inverters_tags,df,df1,df2):
    import datetime
    print(Block_list)
    data_frame_list=[]
    data_frame_inverter_downtime_list=[]
    for i in Block_list:
        if i in missing_inverters_tags:
            continue
        else:
            each_tag_list=[]
            each_tag_list.append(i)
            df_each_tag=df2[df2["itemname"]==i]
            df_each_tag_with_radiation=pd.merge(df_each_tag,Radiation_Tag,how="inner",left_on=["Hour","Minute"],right_on=["Hour","Minute"])
            df_each_tag_with_radiation=df_each_tag_with_radiation.drop_duplicates(subset=["Hour","Minute"]).reset_index(drop=True)
            df_each_tag_with_radiation=df_each_tag_with_radiation[["ISTtime_x","itemname_x","value_x","value_y"]]
            df_each_tag_with_radiation["value_y"]=df_each_tag_with_radiation["value_y"].astype("float64")
            df_each_tag_with_radiation_pattern=df_each_tag_with_radiation[(df_each_tag_with_radiation["value_x"]==0) & (df_each_tag_with_radiation["value_y"]!=0)].reset_index(drop=True)
            
            print(df_each_tag_with_radiation)       
            up_time=str(df_each_tag_with_radiation[df_each_tag_with_radiation["value_x"]!=0]["ISTtime_x"].head(1)).split(" ")[4].split("\n")[0]
            sleep_time=str(df_each_tag_with_radiation[df_each_tag_with_radiation["value_x"]!=0]["ISTtime_x"].tail(1)).split(" ")[4].split("\n")[0]
            Dc_load_Tag=i.split("..")[0]+".."+i.split("..")[1].split(".")[0]+"."+"TODAY_GEN"
            print(Dc_load_Tag)
            Dc_load=float(df_Static[df_Static["SimilarTag"]==Dc_load_Tag]["InvDCLoad"].iloc[0])
            print(Dc_load)
            up_time_hour=up_time.split(":")[0]
            up_time_minute=up_time.split(":")[1]
            up_time_second=up_time.split(":")[2].split(".")[0]
            #up_time_millisecond=up_time.split(":")[2].split(".")[1]
            sleep_time_hour=sleep_time.split(":")[0]
            sleep_time_minute=sleep_time.split(":")[1]
            sleep_time_second=sleep_time.split(":")[2].split(".")[0]
            #sleep_time_millisecond=sleep_time.split(":")[2].split(".")[1]
            a1=datetime.timedelta(hours=int(up_time_hour), minutes=int(up_time_minute), seconds=int(up_time_second)) 
            b1=datetime.timedelta(hours=int(sleep_time_hour), minutes=int(sleep_time_minute), seconds=int(sleep_time_second))
            op_minute=(b1-a1).seconds/60
            df_each_tag_inv_efficiency_average=df1[(df1["itemname"]==i.split(".")[0]+".."+i.split(".")[2]+".INVERTER_EFFICIENCY") & (df1["value"]!=0)]["value"].mean()
            df_each_tag_inv_efficiency_max=df1[(df1["itemname"]==i.split(".")[0]+".."+i.split(".")[2]+".INVERTER_EFFICIENCY") & (df1["value"]!=0)]["value"].max()

            #print(up_time,sleep_time)
            downtime=0
            energy_loss=0
            if len(df_each_tag_with_radiation_pattern)==0:
                each_tag_list.append(np.round(downtime,2))
                each_tag_list.append(up_time)
                each_tag_list.append(sleep_time)
                each_tag_list.append(op_minute)
                each_tag_list.append(op_minute-np.round(downtime,2))
                each_tag_list.append(np.round(df_each_tag_inv_efficiency_average,4))
                each_tag_list.append(np.round(df_each_tag_inv_efficiency_max,4))
                each_tag_list.append(np.round((energy_loss/60000)*df_each_tag_inv_efficiency_max*downtime,2))
                data_frame_list.append(each_tag_list) 
            else:
                print(df_each_tag_with_radiation_pattern)
                #energy_loss=list(df_each_tag_with_radiation_pattern["value_y"])
                #energy_loss=[i if i<890 else 890 for i in energy_loss]
                #energy_loss=np.sum(energy_loss)
                index_list=[-1]
                for i in range(0,len(df_each_tag_with_radiation_pattern)):
                    if i<=len(df_each_tag_with_radiation_pattern)-2:
                        #print("i=",i)
                        hour_i=int(str(df_each_tag_with_radiation_pattern.iloc[i,0]).split(' ')[1].split(":")[0])
                        minute_i=int(str(df_each_tag_with_radiation_pattern.iloc[i,0]).split(' ')[1].split(":")[1])
                        second_i=int(str(df_each_tag_with_radiation_pattern.iloc[i,0]).split(' ')[1].split(":")[2].split(".")[0])
                        #millisecond_i=int(str(df_each_tag_with_radiation_pattern.iloc[i,0]).split(' ')[1].split(":")[2].split(".")[1])
                        hour_ii=int(str(df_each_tag_with_radiation_pattern.iloc[i+1,0]).split(' ')[1].split(":")[0])
                        minute_ii=int(str(df_each_tag_with_radiation_pattern.iloc[i+1,0]).split(' ')[1].split(":")[1])
                        second_ii=int(str(df_each_tag_with_radiation_pattern.iloc[i+1,0]).split(' ')[1].split(":")[2].split(".")[0])
                        #millisecond_ii=int(str(df_each_tag_with_radiation_pattern.iloc[i+1,0]).split(' ')[1].split(":")[2].split(".")[1])
                        a=datetime.timedelta(hours=int(hour_i), minutes=int(minute_i), seconds=int(second_i)) 
                        b=datetime.timedelta(hours=int(hour_ii), minutes=int(minute_ii), seconds=int(second_ii))
                        minute=(b-a).seconds/60
                        #print(minute)
                        if minute>12:
                            index_list.append(i)
                    else:
                        break
                index_list.append(len(df_each_tag_with_radiation_pattern)-1)
                downtime=0
                energy_loss=0
                print(index_list)
                for o in range(len(index_list)):
                    if o<=(len(index_list)-2):
                        To=str(df_each_tag_with_radiation_pattern.iloc[index_list[o]+1,0]).split(' ')[1]
                        From=str(df_each_tag_with_radiation_pattern.iloc[index_list[o+1],0]).split(' ')[1]
                        print(To,From)
                        Energy_Tag=(df_each_tag_with_radiation_pattern.iloc[0,1].split("..")[0])+".."+(df_each_tag_with_radiation_pattern.iloc[0,1].split("..")[1]).split(".")[0]+"."+"TODAY_GEN"
                        print("Energy_Tag_is",Energy_Tag)
                        #deviation
                        To=str(df.iloc[0,0]).split(" ")[0]+" "+To
                        From=str(df.iloc[0,0]).split(" ")[0]+" "+From
                        deviation=df[(df["itemname"]==Energy_Tag) & (df["ISTtime"]>=str(To)) & (df["ISTtime"]<=str(From))   ]["value"].std()
                        print("deviation is",deviation)
                        energy_start=df[(df["itemname"]==Energy_Tag) & (df["ISTtime"]>=str(To)) & (df["ISTtime"]<=str(From))   ].head(1)["value"].iloc[0]
                        print("deviation is",deviation)
                        energy_final=df[(df["itemname"]==Energy_Tag) & (df["ISTtime"]>=str(To)) & (df["ISTtime"]<=str(From))   ].tail(1)["value"].iloc[0]
                        if ((energy_final-energy_start)<10) & (energy_start!=0):
                            
                            print("inside if")
                            ml2=[]
                            ml2.append(str(df_each_tag_with_radiation_pattern.iloc[0,0]).split(' ')[0])
                            ml2.append(df_each_tag_with_radiation_pattern.iloc[0,1])
                            #To=str(df_each_tag_with_radiation_pattern.iloc[index_list[i]+1,0]).split(' ')[1]
                            #From=str(df_each_tag_with_radiation_pattern.iloc[index_list[i+1],0]).split(' ')[1]

                            ml2.append(str(df_each_tag_with_radiation_pattern.iloc[index_list[o]+1,0]).split(' ')[1])
                            ml2.append(str(df_each_tag_with_radiation_pattern.iloc[index_list[o+1],0]).split(' ')[1])

                            hour_i=int(str(df_each_tag_with_radiation_pattern.iloc[index_list[o]+1,0]).split(' ')[1].split(":")[0])
                            minute_i=int(str(df_each_tag_with_radiation_pattern.iloc[index_list[o]+1,0]).split(' ')[1].split(":")[1])
                            second_i=int(str(df_each_tag_with_radiation_pattern.iloc[index_list[o]+1,0]).split(' ')[1].split(":")[2].split(".")[0])
                            #millisecond_i=int(str(df_each_tag_with_radiation_pattern.iloc[index_list[i]+1,0]).split(' ')[1].split(":")[2].split(".")[1])
                            hour_ii=int(str(df_each_tag_with_radiation_pattern.iloc[index_list[o+1],0]).split(' ')[1].split(":")[0])
                            minute_ii=int(str(df_each_tag_with_radiation_pattern.iloc[index_list[o+1],0]).split(' ')[1].split(":")[1])
                            second_ii=int(str(df_each_tag_with_radiation_pattern.iloc[index_list[o+1],0]).split(' ')[1].split(":")[2].split(".")[0])
                            #millisecond_ii=int(str(df_each_tag_with_radiation_pattern.iloc[index_list[i+1],0]).split(' ')[1].split(":")[2].split(".")[1])
                            a=datetime.timedelta(hours=int(hour_i), minutes=int(minute_i), seconds=int(second_i)) 
                            b=datetime.timedelta(hours=int(hour_ii), minutes=int(minute_ii), seconds=int(second_ii))
                            #print(hour_i,minute_i,second_i,hour_ii,minute_ii,second_ii)
                            minute=(b-a).seconds/60
                            downtime=downtime+minute
                            energy_sum_during_downtime=Radiation_Block1[(Radiation_Block1["ISTtime"]>=str(To)) & (Radiation_Block1["ISTtime"]<=str(From))   ]["value"].sum()
                            energy_loss=energy_loss+energy_sum_during_downtime
                            ml2.append(minute)
                            data_frame_inverter_downtime_list.extend([ml2])
                print(energy_loss,Pr,Dc_load)
                each_tag_list.append(np.round(downtime,2))
                each_tag_list.append(up_time)
                each_tag_list.append(sleep_time)
                each_tag_list.append(op_minute)
                each_tag_list.append(op_minute-np.round(downtime,2))
                each_tag_list.append(np.round(df_each_tag_inv_efficiency_average,4))
                each_tag_list.append(np.round(df_each_tag_inv_efficiency_max,4))
                each_tag_list.append(np.round((energy_loss/12000)*(df_each_tag_inv_efficiency_max/100)*Pr*Dc_load,2))
                data_frame_list.append(each_tag_list)
    data_frame_list_final.extend(data_frame_list)
    data_frame_inverter_downtime_list_final.extend(data_frame_inverter_downtime_list)

    print(len(data_frame_list_final))

#time_batch_list=[(6,8),(8,10),(10,12),(12,14),(14,16),(16,19)]
def time_batch_list(Batch_Start,Batch_finish):
    df=df_raw[(df_raw["Hour"]>=Batch_Start) & (df_raw["Hour"]<=Batch_finish)]
    df1=df.copy()
    df2=df.copy()
    df_preprocessed=df.copy()
    df=df[df['itemname'].isin(Inverter_allEnergyTags)]
    len(df["itemname"].unique())
    df["itemname"]=df["itemname"].str.replace(".","..").str.split(".").apply(lambda x:x[0])+"..INV"+df["itemname"].str.replace(".","..").str.split(".").apply(lambda x:str(x[-1].split("_")[0])[-1])+"."+"TODAY_GEN"
    new_columns_list=df_tag.columns[[9,10,12,13,15,16,17,18,19,20,21,22,26,27,29,28,30,31,32,33]]
    len(new_columns_list)
    tagname=new_columns_list[0]
    Tags=df_tag[str(tagname)].to_list()
    print(len(Tags))
    df_preprocess_new_columns=df_preprocessed[df_preprocessed['itemname'].isin(Tags)]
    print(new_columns_list[0])
    print(len(df_preprocess_new_columns["itemname"].unique()))
    df_preprocess_new_columns["itemname"]=df_preprocess_new_columns["itemname"].str.replace(".","..").str.split(".").apply(lambda x:x[0])+"..INV"+df_preprocess_new_columns["itemname"].str.replace(".","..").str.split(".").apply(lambda x:str(x[2].split("_")[0])[-1])+"."+"TODAY_GEN"
    df_preprocess_new_columns["ICR"]=df_preprocess_new_columns["itemname"].apply(lambda x:x.split("..")[0])
    df_preprocess_new_columns["INV"]=df_preprocess_new_columns["itemname"].apply(lambda x:x.split("..")[1].split('.')[0])
    ICR_dict={"ICR1":"ICR01",
            "ICR2":"ICR02",
            "ICR3":"ICR03",
            "ICR4":"ICR04",
            "ICR5":"ICR05",
            "ICR6":"ICR06",
            "ICR7":"ICR07",
            "ICR8":"ICR08",
            "ICR9":"ICR09"}
    df_preprocess_new_columns["ICR"].replace(ICR_dict,inplace=True)
    #print("Unique_Inv",len(df_preprocess_new_columns["INV"].unique()))

    df_preprocess_new_columns["Inv"]=df_preprocess_new_columns["ICR"].str[0]+df_preprocess_new_columns["ICR"].str[-2:]+"_"+df_preprocess_new_columns["INV"].str[-1]
    df_preprocess_new_columns=df_preprocess_new_columns.groupby(by=["Inv"]).agg("max").reset_index()
    print("Unique_Inv",len(df_preprocess_new_columns["Inv"].unique()))
    print(df_preprocess_new_columns)
    df_preprocess_new_columns=df_preprocess_new_columns[["Inv","value"]]
    df_final_new_columns=df_preprocess_new_columns
    df_final_new_columns.to_excel("abfss://devlop@ayanadatalake.dfs.core.windows.net/Bikaner/Bkn_example3.xlsx")


    for i in range(1,19):
        tagname=new_columns_list[i]
        Tags=df_tag[str(tagname)].to_list()
        #print(len(Tags))
        df_preprocess_new_columns=df_preprocessed[df_preprocessed['itemname'].isin(Tags)]
        print(new_columns_list[i])
        print(len(df_preprocess_new_columns["itemname"].unique()))
        df_preprocess_new_columns["itemname"]=df_preprocess_new_columns["itemname"].str.replace(".","..").str.split(".").apply(lambda x:x[0])+"..INV"+df_preprocess_new_columns["itemname"].str.replace(".","..").str.split(".").apply(lambda x:str(x[2].split("_")[0])[-1])+"."+"TODAY_GEN"
        df_preprocess_new_columns["ICR"]=df_preprocess_new_columns["itemname"].apply(lambda x:x.split("..")[0])
        df_preprocess_new_columns["INV"]=df_preprocess_new_columns["itemname"].apply(lambda x:x.split("..")[1].split('.')[0])
        print(df_preprocess_new_columns)
        ICR_dict={"ICR1":"ICR01",
             "ICR2":"ICR02",
             "ICR3":"ICR03",
             "ICR4":"ICR04",
             "ICR5":"ICR05",
             "ICR6":"ICR06",
             "ICR7":"ICR07",
             "ICR8":"ICR08",
             "ICR9":"ICR09"}
        df_preprocess_new_columns["ICR"].replace(ICR_dict,inplace=True)

        df_preprocess_new_columns["Inv"]=df_preprocess_new_columns["ICR"].str[0]+df_preprocess_new_columns["ICR"].str[-2:]+"_"+df_preprocess_new_columns["INV"].str[-1]
        df_preprocess_new_columns=df_preprocess_new_columns.groupby(by=["Inv"]).agg("max").reset_index()
        df_preprocess_new_columns=df_preprocess_new_columns[["Inv","value"]]
        print(len(df_preprocess_new_columns))
        df_final_new_columns=pd.merge(df_final_new_columns,df_preprocess_new_columns,on="Inv")    


    df_final_new_columns

    df_final_new_columns1=df_final_new_columns.copy()

    tagname=new_columns_list[19]
